lead_paragraph: Mr. Biden’s remarks came as the Obama administration works to smooth tensions with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

headline.print_headline: Biden Strikes a Softer Tone at an Israel Independence Event
headline.main: Biden Strikes a Softer Tone at Israel Independence Event

snippet: Mr. Biden’s remarks came as the Obama administration works to smooth tensions with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr defends Pres Obama's support for Israel at reception to celebrate 67th anniversary of Israel's independence, working to smooth tensions with Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu over budding nuclear pact with Iran.
